original_title: Union Bank opens newest Digital Zone in Rajagiriya
original_body_lines: Union Bank opened a highly automated Digital Zone in Rajagiriya, as part of the Bank’s digital transformation initiatives to expand Smart Banking convenience to customers. Union Bank Digital Zones were also opened at the Bank’s Head Office and at the Pettah branch recently.
